entities.name: kendra dumbledore
entities.description: Kendra Dumbledore is mentioned as the wife of Percival and she decided to uproot the family and relocate to Godric's Hollow. She was known for being proud and haughty.

entities.name: percival dumbledore
entities.description: Percival Dumbledore is mentioned as Kendra's husband who was arrested and imprisoned in Azkaban.

entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: Godric's Hollow is a village where Kendra decided to relocate her family. It later gained fame as the scene of Harry Potter's strange escape from You-Know-Who.

entities.name: mould-on-the-wold
entities.description: Mould-on-the-Wold is a village where Kendra and her family previously lived. It was similar to Godric's Hollow in having Wizarding families.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is a prison where Percival Dumbledore was imprisoned after his arrest.

entities.name: bathilda bagshot
entities.description: Bathilda Bagshot is mentioned as someone who tried to welcome Kendra with homemade Cauldron Cakes but was rebuffed.

relationships.description: Kendra and Percival are mentioned as husband and wife. Kendra's decision to relocate was likely influenced by her husband's imprisonment in Azkaban.
Kendra decided to uproot the family and relocate to Godric's Hollow after her husband's arrest.
Bathilda Bagshot tried to welcome Kendra with homemade Cauldron Cakes but was rebuffed by Kendra.
